newProducts.title: Windsurf by Codeium
newProducts.description: The first agentic IDE launched by Codeium in November 2024. Positioned as a direct competitor to Cursor with similar AI-powered coding capabilities at 25% lower pricing. Already generating $50 million in annualized revenue.

newProducts.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP)
newProducts.description: Anthropic's open standard launched November 25, 2024 for secure two-way connections between AI applications and data sources. Enables developers to build standardized integrations for AI coding tools.

newProducts.title: Lovable AI
newProducts.description: Swedish AI startup that relaunched in November 2024 and became the fastest-growing software company ever. Offers 'vibe coding' capabilities with over 10 million projects created since launch.

newProducts.title: Claude Code Web Beta
newProducts.description: Anthropic expanded Claude Code to web and mobile in October/November 2024, allowing developers to spin up and manage Claude Code agents from browsers, enabling parallel coding tasks from anywhere.

newProducts.title: Pieces for Developers Workstream Pattern Engine
newProducts.description: Enhanced AI capabilities introduced in November 2024 with temporally-grounded AI that captures developer work across desktop apps, IDEs, browsers, and terminals for context-aware assistance.

newProducts.title: GitHub Copilot Coding Agent
newProducts.description: GitHub introduced an autonomous coding agent feature in late 2024 that works asynchronously in GitHub Actions-powered environments to independently draft code, run tests, and create pull requests.

newProducts.title: DeepCode: Open Agentic Coding
newProducts.description: Multi-agent AI development platform that automates code generation and implementation tasks. Handles complexity through coordinated agent systems for spec-driven development.

newProducts.title: Agentic Code Framework
newProducts.description: Open-source framework for turning chaotic AI coding into systematic workflows. AGENTS.md compliant framework designed for reliable LLM development.
